experienceDescription: ● Developed and maintained website pages including Home, Services, Blog, and Contact, ensuring mobile responsiveness and SEO optimization.
● Integrated a CMS backend for managing content updates (blog posts, services details, featured partners).
● Implemented UI components for certificate display sections and partner logos carousel.
● Troubleshot cross-browser issues (Chrome, Firefox, Safari) to ensure consistent user experience.
● Authored and managed sitemap, metadata, and web analytics setup.
● Key technologies: e.g., WordPress/Headless CMS, PHP/Node.js, HTML5, CSS3/SASS, JavaScript, jQuery or React, SEO tools, Google Analytics.
● Participated in the KOC Ambassador Program by ACCESSTRADE, producing TikTok video content for the Vincom brand (part of the Vingroup ecosystem: Vincom, Vinpearl, Vinmec, etc.).
● Planned, filmed, and edited 15–60 second TikTok videos using storytelling techniques tailored to trending formats and user behavior.
● Optimized video SEO on TikTok, including captions, hashtags, and tagged locations to maximize visibility and reach.
● Delivered periodic campaign performance reports and proposed content enhancements based on audience insights and brand feedback.
● Designed blog visuals and layouts aligned with brand identity.
● Created SEO-friendly blog content on fashion and lifestyle topics.
● Shot and edited photos for campaigns and social media.
● Collaborated on creative concepts for seasonal promotions..
